roleset.name: reflex caused by oject in mouth

example.name: gag-v: bound and gagged
example.text: [Imette 's hands and feet]-1 were bound *-1 and [her mouth]-3 gagged *-3 with a white athletic sock.

roleset.note: GAG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gag' based on survey of sentences in ebc. Verbnet classes 9.9 and 42.3; other framed members include blanket, cloak, frame, harness, poison, stress, water; choke, kill, muzzle, repress, smother. (from gag.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: able to elicit the gag reflex

example.name: gagworthy-j
example.text: She's gotta be right, the stench of dead fish is gagworthy.

roleset.note: GAGWORTHY-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from gagworthy.01-j)
